title: Has Eminem music declined in quality? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not sure it's declined, I don't think he ever made music to his full potential,it seemed squarely aimed at the chart such naturally compromised his skill. I do think he's had some good verses when he features on other artists records, and some of the, D12 stuff is good, in my opinion. He is a very talented MC so hopefully the best is yet to come

Yes, he fell off after his first two albums. Really I only fuck with his first album. I have found that he has recycled the same themes and content over and over again. He has done better over the years with posse cuts.
